title: Can we have tribunal, refund tokens and OCE skin please?
body: Rito (Get it I spelt it wrong haha!) pls.

replies.body:
Screw all that, we need Legend of the Poro King. Rito pls.
The refund idea is something I am for but don't care about.
Tribunal is rito pls
And OCE Skin? Hmm... end of next year we need Aatrox in a graduation robe and called ATARtrox even though most people outside Australia wouldn't understand it. Another thing I don't care about.
I live in Queensland and I have no idea what ATAR's are.
It is our end of year twelve marking %%%% in Victoria.
Best username I've seen. Anyway, we're not going to get more refund tokens so deal with it. It doesn't seem like they will give out more.
we have refund tokens...infact i still have all 3, even tho i used 2 in season 2...so maybe coming to OCE reset them? rekt

we need the 1st one for sure.

as far as refund tokens, that is just silly and should not happen UNLESS if the token only works on things that have NOT been used in a ranked game. ( so you can view it etc in normals )

and the last one meh
